name: Chess 2 (itch) (happy737)
description:
Chess 2, chess but with a modified rule set. 

This game is a chess puzzle game in which every chess piece has an attack and an HP stat. This modifies captures so that the defending piece may live and deal damage back. This incentivices the player to upgrade the attack stats of their pieces to have a higher chance of capturing immediately, but also to upgrade their HP stats as to deny the enemy the ability to do the same.
The goal of the game is to complete each level in as few moves, using the least pieces possible.
